title: Fizik Team Amani and Black Mamba Ferox Carbon and Atlas Gravel Shoes
content:
Fizik has launched limited-edition versions of its popular Ferox Carbon and Atlas gravel shoes in bold, new Team Amani and Black Mamba colorways. To celebrate the achievements of Team Amani, fizik has unveiled two new designs, both inspired by the wildlife of Kenya…

Ferox Carbon Team Amani

With a dual closure system, the instep and forefoot are independently adjustable, enabling a secure and bespoke fit. Along the instep, Powerstrap provides exceptional foot containment at high cadence – a trait which is particularly needed whilst pedalling off-road – whilst also providing a robust, crash-proof system. The premium bi-directional Li2 BOA® Fit System, meanwhile, is located on the forefoot, ensuring a micro-adjustable precision fit with even pressure distribution.

Stiff Sole

The perfect fit is complemented by the X1 carbon and rubber outsole. With a high stiffness to weight ratio, the carbon plate transfers the power generated from shoe to bike efficiently. The outsole is also equipped with generous studs and a rubber coating that covers the shoe’s entire surfaces, delivering improved traction for those off-the-bike moments.

Lightweight, Breathable, Tough

Ferox’s weight is kept low due to an innovative upper construction where a polyurethane-laminated material is incorporated over a translucent and comfortable mesh. This not only saves weight, but is also breathable and tear resistant.

Specs:

Durable woven mesh over a PU laminated upper
Li2 BOA® Fit System
X1 Carbon outsole – with rubber tread
Stiffness index 10
Weight: 297g*
Sizes: 36-48 (37 to 47 also in half sizes)
Colorway: Team Amani special edition
£309 / $309 / €309

Atlas Black Mamba

The Atlas remains one of the most versatile off-road shoes in the fizik range; equally capable of handling fast and fun downcountry laps, epic all-mountain rides, long-distance backcountry adventures and drop bar gravel grinding.

Comfort and Protection

Atlas’s generous fit and single BOA closure allows for long-lasting comfort, while its TPU overlay both reinforces the toecap and provides added ventilation without sacrificing protection.

Grip and Efficiency

The X5 outsole is equipped with generous studs and a rubber coating that provide improved grip and traction on steep and rough terrain.

The hidden nylon foot plate delivers balanced stiffness for efficient pedalling while the low-cut uppers allow for smooth, unhindered ankle movement during every pedal stroke.

L6 BOA® Fit System
X5 nylon outsole – with rubber tread
Stiffness index 5
Weight: 355g*
Sizes: 36-48 (37 to 47 also in half sizes)
Colorway: Black Mamba special edition
£169 / $169 / €169
